__TOC__


This page is an account of where and when Ubuntu, Linux and Free and Open Source Software get mentioned in the Australian media.

It is not ment to be authoritive, but a collection of interesting snippits from what is seem the be the main-stream media outlets in Australia.

Project started: Fri, 7 July 2006

=== Dedicated Media Channels ===
==== Podcasts ====
'''Linux Australia Update''' and '''LUG Update''' - http://localfoss.org/

=== Linux and Free and Open Source Software ===
